name: Last Call (BulletsArePeopleToo)
description:
Defend the last beer in the world. Made for Ludum Dare 37 (Theme: One Room).

WASD - Move

Right click - Pick up / throw weapons

Left click - Swing weapons

Music by Kevin MacLeod ("Exit the Premises")

Click here to go to the Ludum Dare entry.

This version contains some bugfixes that were made after Ludum Dare 37. If you'd like to download this version or the original Ludum Dare 37 submission, bugs and all, there are downloads for Windows below.
